snippet: Alex Smith, who entered the game with eight touchdown passes and one interception, giving him the N.F.L.’s top passer rating, was intercepted three times by the Giants.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Alex Smith, who entered game against New York Giants with eight touchdown passes and one interception, giving him NFL’s top passer rating, is intercepted three times by Giants.
lead_paragraph: Alex Smith, who entered the game with eight touchdown passes and one interception, giving him the N.F.L.’s top passer rating, was intercepted three times by the Giants.

headline.main: Even on the 49ers’ Turf, the Air Still Belongs to Manning and the Giants
headline.print_headline: Even on the 49ers’ Turf, the Air Still Belongs to Manning and the Giants
